replies.msg:
I see in your eyes ...
the same fear that would take the heart of me.
A day may come when the courage of Men falls ...
when we forsake our friends and break all bonds of fellowship.
But it is not this day.
An hour of wolves and shattered shields ...
when the age of Men comes crashing down.
But it is not this day.
This day we fight!
By all that you hold dear on this good earth ...
I bid you stand, Men of the West(HongKonger)!

我看到你們的眼裡 ...
有著和我心裡同樣的恐懼。
或許有一天，人類變得畏縮懦弱 ...
我們捨棄朋友，斷絕盟誼。
但絕不是這一天。
或許有一天，豺狼攻破人類城池 ...
人類的年代崩析瓦解；
但絕不是這一天。
這一天我們誓死奮戰！
為了這片美好土地上你們所擁有珍惜的一切 ...
我命令你們抗敵，西方的士兵(香港人)！
